SELECT vm.id, vm.patientcode, vm.belowquestion, vm.createdate, vm.note, p.patientname, p.id_sex as idSex, p.id_examtype as idExamtype, p.jktjzt, p.zytjzt, vm.is_inspected as isHandled FROM md_visit_main vm LEFT JOIN md_peispatient p ON p.patientcode = vm.patientcode
vm.type = 2 AND vm.is_delete = 0
AND vm.patientcode LIKE concat('%',#{param.patientcode},'%')
AND p.patientname LIKE concat('%',#{param.patientname},'%')
ORDER BY vm.createdate DESC

SELECT vm.id, vm.patientcode, vm.belowquestion, STR_TO_DATE( vm.createdate, '%Y-%m-%d') as createDate, vm.note, p.patientname, p.id_sex as idSex, p.id_examtype as idExamtype, p.jktjzt, p.zytjzt, vm.is_inspected as isHandled FROM md_visit_main vm LEFT JOIN md_peispatient p ON p.patientcode = vm.patientcode
vm.type = 2 AND vm.is_delete = 0
AND vm.patientcode LIKE concat('%',#{param.patientcode},'%')
AND p.patientname LIKE concat('%',#{param.patientname},'%')
ORDER BY vm.createdate DESC
